when people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.

My favorite people are the ones who can appreciate my cooking.
i have a lot of friends.

My studies are my top priority.

content.text: Hey there, how are you?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you. I just started my own photography business from home so I can listen to my music while working.
That's awesome! I took a year off to pursue my music career, so I know how important it is to be able to do what you love.
I'm glad you did that. It's important to follow your dreams. I also love going to concerts on the weekend. What's your favorite genre of music?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm especially into rock and roll. I love the energy of it.
Me too! I love going to concerts and just getting lost in the music.
What's your favorite band?
I have a lot of favorites, but I'd have to say the Foo Fighters are probably my number one.
They're great! I love their energy.
Me too. They're always so fun to see live.
What's your favorite song by them?
I'd have to say "The Pretender" is my favorite.
That's a great song. I love the guitar solo.
Me too! It's so iconic.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who loves the same things you do.
It is. So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to a concert or just hang out at home.
If you decide to go to a concert, let me know. I'd love to go with you.
Okay, I'll let you know.
Great! Have a good day!
You too
